self_predictions.prediction_summary: Todd believes he can neutralize Kanai's pronation and prevent him from getting his shoulder in, focusing on back pressure and top roll.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Back pressure top roll vs Kanai's pronation and side pressure

Yoshinobu Kanai.strength: Brute power in pronation and side pressure
Yoshinobu Kanai.health: Returning after a long break, potential freshness issue
Yoshinobu Kanai.previous_match_summary: Historically strong when wrist is high and shoulder is engaged

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Todd admits difficulty judging female armwrestlers due to lack of consistency in their performances.
Todd thinks Carolina will figure out how to win despite Dimitrina being stronger and more accomplished.

Carolina Pettersson.previous_match_summary: Capable of figuring out how to win

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Todd doesn't bet against Oleg Zhokh, citing a mix of personal liking and belief in his strength.
Todd believes Sagov's press is phenomenal and will win convincingly, possibly all rounds.

Ibragim Sagov.health: Now heavier, possibly more natural at current weight
Ibragim Sagov.previous_match_summary: Strong performances in East vs West events

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Todd thinks Vitalii underperforms relative to his potential and Georgii will win convincingly.

Vitalii Laletin.previous_match_summary: Does not arm wrestle as good as he should

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Todd believes Irakli is firmly established in his weight class and will be hard to displace.

Irakli Zirakashvili.previous_match_summary: Built a nest in his weight class

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Todd thinks Genadi is a heavy favorite unless Michael Todd changes his strategy significantly from their last match.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: King's move vs high top roll

Michael Todd.previous_match_summary: King's move was ineffective against Genadi last time

Genadi Kvikvinia.strength: Good hand, good high top roll

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Todd considers Alizhan the favorite, likening him to the dominant left-arm version of Davit Samushia.

Alizhan Muratov.previous_match_summary: Dominant in left arm, likened to Samushia

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Todd predicts Oleg will win the first match due to Devon's slow starts, but Devon will adjust and win the series.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Position and control vs aggressive attack

Devon Larratt.health: Cutting weight but expected to maintain strength
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Typically loses first match then adjusts
